entry.tran: （墙壁和地板相连处的）踢脚板，壁脚板，护壁板
entry.def: A baseboard is a narrow length of wood which goes along the bottom of a wall in a room and makes a border between the walls and the floor.

means.word_mean: 1. a molding covering the joint formed by a wall and the floor
